item.title: Crewmember Interphone Systems Upper Deck Call and Communication System – Personnel Address System Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Personnel Address System is operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard Crewmember Interphone System Flight Deck to Ground "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
